Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Rock roast is the greatest thing to happen
to Hyrule.

Yes, indeed. It is the finest of edible
delicacies and a necessity for us Gorons.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>I put down some tracks <clr:ffff>so we could load
up on stock easily.

But even with the tracks, it can be a
challenge for Gorons to collect rock roast.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Welcome to Bedrock Bistro, a gourmet-
roast restaurant.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_00>What use could a Hylian have for
rock roast anyway?

If you give me one, I'll treat you to
my finest <clr:0000>cooking<clr:ffff>. Pretty good trade,
if ya ask me.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Uh. <sp:5:0:0>Sir, <sp:5:1:0>your pouch is still full.


Our special dish is the <clr:0000>seared gourmet
steak<clr:ffff>. Come on back once you've made
space in your pouch.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I want to treat you to our specialty!
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>I see... You don't have any <clr:0000>rock roast<clr:ffff>,
do you.

Well, if you happen upon some and
bring it my way, I'll treat you to our
<clr:0000>special dish<clr:ffff>.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>I can't help but smell it...


<sp:3:0:2:0101>You've got <clr:0000>rock roast<clr:ffff>. If you provide it to
me, I'll whip up our <clr:0000>special dish <clr:ffff>for you.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Welcome to Bedrock Bistro.


Ours is the finest restaurant in Hyrule,
specializing in gourmet roasts.

Whether you're a Goron or Hylian, I have
every confidence you'll be salivating
for more.
If you're hankerin' for a steak, please
order directly from the grill.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>I have to say, I'm relieved you're a Hylian.


Right now, <clr:0000>rock roast <clr:ffff>is in short supply,
and I don't know if I have enough to keep
up with demand for the Gorons.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>I can't go get supplies myself at the
moment, so I'm in a bit of a bind.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>By the way, I couldn't help notice...


<sp:3:0:2:0101>You've got an interesting thing goin' on
with that rock roast.

In that state, I wouldn't be able to use it
in my cooking.

But if you happen to have any untainted
rock roast, then I'd be happy if you gave
it to me.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>In exchange, I'd cook you our
<clr:0000>special dish<clr:ffff>!
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Even if I sell out of the Hylian
ingredients, I can restock 'em quickly.

Right now it's <clr:0000>rock roast <clr:ffff>that's in short
supply. I don't know if I have enough to
keep up with demand for the Gorons.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>I can't go get supplies myself at the
moment, so I'm in a bit of a bind.
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're really rockin' it, walkin' around
with that rock roast, you know that?

I wouldn't have a cooking use for it in
that state.

But if you happen to have any untainted
rock roast, then I'd be happy if you gave
it to me!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>In exchange, I'd cook you our
<clr:0000>special dish<clr:ffff>!
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're hankerin' for something, please
order directly from the grill.

I have to say, I'm relieved you're a Hylian.


Right now, <clr:0000>rock roast <clr:ffff>is in short supply,
and I don't know if I've got enough to
keep up with demand for the Gorons.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>I can't go get supplies myself at the
moment, so I'm in a bit of a bind.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hm. <sp:5:0:0>Sir, <sp:5:1:0>your pouch is full.


Our special dish, which I'd love to provide
to you, is <clr:0000>seared gourmet steak<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'll take this rock roast off your hands,
so please come back once you've made
space in your pouch.
I want to treat you to our special dish!
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseM_00>Oh, sir! That <clr:0000>rock roast<clr:ffff> there! Could I
have it?

If you give it to me, I'll whip up our
<clr:0000>special dish<clr:ffff> just for you.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, you're the customer who brought
me the rock roast.

Did you make space in your pouch?
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Wonderful, thank you so much! To show
my gratitude, here is the special dish
I promised.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks for bringing me the rock roast.<sp:5:0:0>
Did you make space in your pouch?
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Come on back once you've made space in
your pouch!

I'll treat you to our special dish, <clr:0000>seared
gourmet steak<clr:ffff>!
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I don't have enough <clr:0000>rock roast<clr:ffff>. Bring me
more and I'll whip you up something nice!
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Welcome to Bedrock Bistro.


Ours is the finest restaurant in all of
Eldin. Wait, no... All of Hyrule! Here we
specialize in gourmet roasts.
Whether you're a Goron or Hylian, I have
every confidence you'll be salivating
for more.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I have to say, I'm relieved you're a Hylian.


Y'see, right now <clr:0000>rock roast <clr:ffff>is in short
supply, and I don't know if I have enough
to keep up with demand for the Gorons.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>I can't go get supplies myself at the
moment, so I'm in a bit of a bind.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>And...I'm sorry, but we're also sold out of
food for Hylians... But I should be able to
get some pretty soon here.
You'll just need to wait awhile.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Superb! Here's that special dish
as thanks!
